mapper.select: SELECT /* PointHistoryMapper.selectById */ POINT_HISTORY_ID , MEMBER_ID , POINT_AMOUNT , BALANCE_AFTER , TRANSACTION_TYPE , REFERENCE_TYPE , REFERENCE_ID , DESCRIPTION , CREATED_AT FROM POINT_HISTORY WHERE POINT_HISTORY_ID = #{pointHistoryId}

SELECT /* PointHistoryMapper.selectByMemberId */ POINT_HISTORY_ID , MEMBER_ID , POINT_AMOUNT , BALANCE_AFTER , TRANSACTION_TYPE , REFERENCE_TYPE , REFERENCE_ID , DESCRIPTION , CREATED_AT FROM POINT_HISTORY WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT /* PointHistoryMapper.selectAll */ POINT_HISTORY_ID , MEMBER_ID , POINT_AMOUNT , BALANCE_AFTER , TRANSACTION_TYPE , REFERENCE_TYPE , REFERENCE_ID , DESCRIPTION , CREATED_AT FROM POINT_HISTORY ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
